title: Enginemen
creator_credit: Michael Grigsby, British Film Institute and Unit Five Seven
brief_description: An outstanding documentary offering an impression of engine at locomotive sheds on the outskirts of Manchester, filmed during the early hours of a wintry morning. There is very little commentary other than the men themselves commenting on the changes being brought about in their lives by extensive dieselisation.
